summary: A movie director entices his young friend to come to the beach on the pretext of writing a script. He then starts an affair with the friend's girlfriend.
cast: Seung-woo Kim|Hyun-Jung Go|Seon-mi Song|Kim Tae-Woo|Ban-ya Choi|Chan Jung|Ki-woo Lee|Seong-kun Mun|Tae-kyung Oh
title: Mujer en la playa
